directive_ref: CEO DIRECTIVE WAVE 15/15A - AUTONOMOUS GOLDEN NEEDLE HUNT WITH SOURCE ATTRIBUTION

sources.snippet_or_excerpt: Bitcoin's price was unable to break above $90000 convincingly and is once again found into a retracement.
Bitcoin price has oscillated between a mid-range support level and an upper resistance band below a key overhead level, with multiple...
Coinbase is pushing prediction markets into the mainstream, moving to acquire The Clearing Company as it deepens regulated, onchain event...
Gold and copper have outperformed other major assets this year, with gold rallying more than copper.
The total crypto market cap (TOTAL) and Bitcoin (BTC) are observing a slight rise over the past day, keeping the momentum consistent.

hypothesis_content.title: Prediction Market Sentiment as a Contrarian Breakout Fade
hypothesis_content.statement: A surge in bullish sentiment on major onchain prediction markets (e.g., Polymarket 'BTC > $100K by [date]' contract trading >70% probability) coinciding with a BTC price approach to key resistance ($90K) will act as a contrarian indicator, and a breakout attempt will fail within the next 72 hours.
hypothesis_content.rationale: News indicates prediction markets are expanding. These markets often reflect retail sentiment extremes. At resistance, overly bullish consensus can indicate a crowded trade. The combination of high prediction market odds and price at resistance creates a high-probability fade opportunity in a neutral regime.
entry_conditions: Price of a leading 'BTC bullish' prediction market contract > 0.70 (70% probability)
BTC price is within 2% of a major resistance level (e.g., $88,200 - $90,000)
Funding rates across major perpetual exchanges turn positive but not extreme (<0.01%)

exit_conditions.take_profit: BTC price rejects from resistance and drops 3% from the local high made after entry
exit_conditions.stop_loss: BTC achieves a daily close > 2% above the identified resistance level

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Breakout succeeds despite high prediction market odds, indicating the sentiment gauge is capturing informed, early flow rather than late retail FOMO.
